nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_active_queries_summary_active_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_active_queries_summary_count_older_than_1s) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT count(*) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_active_queries_summary_count_older_than_10s) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_active_queries_summary_count_older_than_100s) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_lock_stats_total_total_lock_wait_seconds) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_lock_stats_top_lock_wait_seconds) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT database_spanner_lock_stats_top_lock_wait_seconds, database WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' AND database_spanner_lock_stats_top_lock_wait_seconds IS NOT NULL SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT count(*) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text LIMIT 50 SINCE 1 month ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_latency_seconds*1000 as 'milliseconds') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_cpu_seconds*1000 as 'milliseconds') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_latency_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text LIMIT 50
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_top_execution_count as 'Execution count') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_top_all_failed_execution_count as 'Failed')WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_rows_scanned as 'Rows scanned') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_rows as 'Rows returned') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_total_avg_latency_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_total_avg_cpu_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_total_avg_bytes) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_total_all_failed_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_total_all_failed_avg_latency_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_total_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_total_avg_rows) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_total_timed_out_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_total_cancelled_or_disconnected_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_total_avg_rows_scanned) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_cpu_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_bytes) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_latency_seconds*1000 as 'ms') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_all_failed_avg_latency_seconds*1000 as 'ms') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_top_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_top_all_failed_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_top_timed_out_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_query_stats_top_cancelled_or_disconnected_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_rows) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_query_stats_top_avg_rows_scanned) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET query_text TIMESERIES SINCE 60 minutes ago

FROM Metric SELECT Sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_total_latency_seconds) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' AND database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_total_latency_seconds IS NOT NULL FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_total_latency_seconds) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_commit_latency_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_bytes) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_participants) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_attempt_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_abort_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_retry_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_failed_precondition_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_avg_bytes) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_avg_total_latency_seconds*1000 as 'milliseconds') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_avg_commit_latency_seconds*1000 as 'milliseconds') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_commit_abort_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_avg_participants) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_commit_attempt_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_commit_retry_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_total_commit_failed_precondition_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_total_latency_seconds*1000) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago

FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_total_latency_seconds*1000 as 'milliseconds') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_commit_latency_seconds*1000 as 'milliseconds') WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_bytes) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_avg_participants) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_attempt_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_abort_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_retry_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_txn_stats_top_commit_retry_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(database_spanner_read_stats_total_avg_cpu_seconds) AS 'ms' WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_read_stats_total_execution_count) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT sum(database_spanner_read_stats_total_avg_rows) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' FACET database SINCE 60 minutes ago TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT count(database_spanner_read_stats_top_avg_cpu_seconds) WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' AND database_spanner_read_stats_top_avg_cpu_seconds IS NOT NULL FACET fingerprint SINCE 60 minutes ago

nrqlQuery.query: SELECT uniques(project_id) FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 3 months ago
SELECT uniques (instance_id) FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 3 months ago
SELECT uniques(database) FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.source = 'gcpspanner' SINCE 3 months ago
